bug.author: igor-susic
bug.description: Documentation bug: At for <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Python-API.md>Python-API</denchmark-link> in the section for <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Python-API.md#loading-a-unity-environment>loading-a-unity-environment</denchmark-link> it states that the is located at but the subdirectory does not exists there, should the path be insted?

comments.comment: Thanks for the report. I've got a PR to fix the location here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/pull/3093>#3093</denchmark-link>
